General.Name: Shandong Weigao Orthopaedic Device Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shandong Weigao Orthopedic Device Co., Ltd. operates as a medical device and pharmaceutical company. It offers spine, trauma, joints, sports medicine, and bone repair materials, as well as offers orthopedic surgical instruments. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Weihai, China. Shandong Weigao Orthopedic Device Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Shandong Weigao Group Medical Polymer Co., Limited.
